HediffDef.label: ursine genetrainer (bear resilience)
HediffDef.description: This genetrainer gives a series of health states related to bear resilience.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.

HediffDef.label: boom genetrainer (chemfuel production)
HediffDef.description: This genetrainer gives the ability to produce chemfuel like a boomalope.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.

HediffDef.label: feline genetrainer (keen sight)

Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. HediffDef.label: insectoid genetrainer (eusocial mind)
